attributes.additional_details: It's long over due that Cumbria gets the infrastructure it needs to cope with the amount of traffic in the county.
attributes.background: How many more unnecessary deaths have to happen before Cumbria County Council and the Government take action and deliver the infrastructure we need.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Cumbria County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://councilportal.cumbria.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
